description:
Free OpenSource .Net Wrapper around un4seen Bass and most of its addons.
This project is currently in development.
You can contribute to it on GitHub.

Samples available on GitHub Repository

The Library is compiled for AnyCPU.
But the Bass dlls need to be checked for x64 or x86.
Put the Bass dlls in the same folder as ManagedBass.dll.
ManagedBass does not need to be licensed for Commercial use, but bass and many of the addons have to be.
Check the below website for more details
Bass dlls are available at http://www.un4seen.com/bass
Bass and its Addons are trademarks of their respective owners.
releaseNotes:
There are lots of changes:

CHANGE:
* More Unicode Implementations
* public WaveFormat structure
* Fixed Bass.CreateStream from user FileProcedures
* Channel is now non-abstact and can be created through the new public constructor accepting a valid channel handle
* Id3v1 and ApeBinaryTag added as separate classes
* In Many Marshalled Structures, previously public fields are now provided by read-only Properties for security
* ChannelGetAttribute uses out instead of ref

ADDITIONS:
* More Effect Presets
* Added PitchShift Effect
* Added BassAsio.DeviceCount
* Added ManagedFileChannel
* Added enum EAXParameters and changed (G/S)etEaxParameters()
* Added Bass.CPUUsage

DELETIONS:
* Removed BufferProvider.Resolution
* Removed Channel.IsDecoder and Channel.Resolution, these are available from Channel.Info

RENAMING:
* Bass.(G/S)etChannelAttribute() to Bass.Channel(G/S)etAttribute()
* Bass.Initialize() to Bass.Init(). Also in Devices.
* Bass.ChannelInfo() to Bass.ChannelGetInfo()
* SyncFlags.Freed to SyncFlags.Free
* Bass.(G/S)etChannelPosition() to Bass.Channel(G/S)etPosition()
* Bass.IsChannelSliding() to Bass.ChannelIsSliding()
* Bass.SlideChannelAttribute() to Bass.ChannelSlideAttribute()
* Bass.GetChannelLevel() to Bass.ChannelGetLevel()
* enum BASSVam to VAMMode
* BassMix.MixerChannel* methods renamed to BassMix.Channel*
* Bass.EnableSpeakerAssignment to Bass.VistaSpeakerAssignment
summary: Free OpenSource .Net Wrapper for Un4seen Bass.
title: ManagedBass
